ENTRY.refkeywords: smc small magellanic cloud Small Magellanic Cloud extinction curve model models modeling modelling source optical
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Extinction curve for the Small Magellanic Cloud

DESC.PARA: This model is the extinction curve for the SMC, as given in Prevot et al., 1984, A&A, 132, 389-392.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
